addBot.addBotVerbiage: Provide below details to create the bot. Once done you can train and launch the bot using the left menu.

editBot.deleteMessage: Do you want to delete the Bot?
editBot.editBotVerbiage: Provide below details to search and edit an existing bot

reTrainBot.heading: Below provides the overall bot performance for all your active bots. Click on the percentage values in order to view partial matches/failed chats. You can then associate the 'Utterance' with desired 'Intent'.
reTrainBot.failedHeading: Below utterances were not identified by the bot. Please select the specific 'Intent' to associate with each utterance. The 'Matched Against' indicates how the Bot matched the utterance.
reTrainBot.maybeHeading: Below utterances were partially matched with 'Intent' by the bot. Please select the specific 'Intent' to associate with each utterance. The 'Matched Against' indicates how the Bot matched the utterance.
reTrainBot.noRecordsHeading: No records found. You have either resolved or ignored all the chats
